name: Infinite Mazes (Quick Coffee Games)
description:
Infinite Mazes is a hyper-casual puzzle game where players have to solve procedurally generated mazes of the size they choose between 10x10 and 50x50. Players canunlock new player models and colours. The game is simple and easy to learn, but hard to master!

- Solve procedurally generated mazes!
- Unlock new player models and colours!
- Increase your statistic and reach high scores!
